short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that will help you get out the dumps with the aid of music

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that will help you get out the dumps with the aid of music. The extension currently takes you to a community playlist on YouTube that has a lot of dance/house music to help lift your mood to get started on that project or that gym session that you've been avoiding! QoL imporvements are already under way, so stay tuned for that!
